name: PortlandMaps
0:
”Alexa, ask Portland Maps if this is garbage pick-up week”
”Alexa, ask Portland Maps about the curbside schedule”
”Alexa, ask Portland Maps if I can recycle wine bottles”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: portland maps
des:
Provides information about the curbside pick-up schedule for the address associated with the Echo device, if located in the Portland Metro Area, in Oregon.

It can answer questions about the current curbside pick up schedule, like when is the next pick up, what will be picked up, or if it is garbage-pick-up week.

It can also specify if a specific item is recyclable, and if so, in which bin it should be put in.

Before the skill can be used, it needs to know whether you are on a every-other-week or every-four-weeks service. This information will be collected only once and saved for future reference. This information can be changed (by asking "Set My Preferences") or deleted (by asking "Delete My Preferences") at any time.
